name: Haze's Hectic Halloween Happenstance
description:
While setting up for a community Halloween party, Haze and their friends accidentally let loose an evil entity that vows to show them their worst fears.  He doesn't quite succeed, but you have to admire his dedication to the craft.

DETAILS
  • ~10 minute runtime
  • Appropriate for all ages
  • Predominantly text-based
  • Attempts at humor

This is a rather small Halloween-themed game.  This also vaguely connected to my other games in that it contains the same characters, but you do not need to play any of them to actually get enjoyment out of this game!
